extendedInfo.description: Now you can set up your home network right from your android phone or tablet. Imagine being able to get your QRS (Quick Router Setup) Mobile enabled router up and running in no time from the comfort of your couch or favorite chair â no more need to hunch over a computer to set up your network. Just follow the simple instructions to get started.QRS Mobile only works with a D-Link DIR-series home router. To view the list of supported routers, please go to http://www.dlink.com/qrsmobileapp

reviews.title: Not Detecting
reviews.comment: Installed perfectly but when asked for password, I entered but not detected with device. Restart my Android phone and tried but not connected.
reviews.author: Akhtar Manan

reviews.title: Works like a charm
reviews.comment: I was struggling since I couldn\'t shake off an older name I had given my repeater mode network. After I reset it (while ON) and used the QR Utility it was so easy. The QR works really well and is very simple. Not too sure why the others had a problem. It solved my problem.
reviews.author: Keith Browne

reviews.title: Hardware works, app doesnt
reviews.comment: Rather than giving it one star follow these instructions. Turn on modem. Press wps button on modem and wireless extension. Connect with your pc to the dlink signal. Use the web browser link supplied ans follow the manual set up instructions. Then it works just fine as a product. On my android the app doesn\'t work at all. One click app connection as promised would have been nice
reviews.author: Alan Devereux

reviews.title: Junk - Plain and Simple
reviews.comment: Installed on S3. Program does NOTHING. Blank screen, then back to the home screen. It would be nice to able to access the router from my phone, but until DLink puts together a package that actually works, one star, only because I can\'t enter zero or negative ratings.
reviews.author: Steven Clark

reviews.comment: HTC Inspire 4, doesn\'t work.  Keeps showing that I\'m not connected to the device, when I clearly am.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The ultimate tool for router instalation
reviews.comment: Finally I dont need a notebook to install a router. This app kills the impression that a router configuration is only for geeks. Now anybody can easily install a router.
reviews.author: Victor Fernando

reviews.title: Great app and feature if it worked
reviews.comment: Awesome feature. Almost bought a crapy linksys because they had this feature printed on the box. Then looked for this to see if a dlink had this feature.  What the dir-827 because it was compatible. They need to get this printed on their box. Edit.  If you change the name of your router it no longer recognizes it. 1 star till its usable.  Still not usable dlink is a joke and I\'m never buying another 1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Working
reviews.comment: I had no problem at all to install everything on my dir 636l. as long as you follow the instructions,you will not face any problems. Update:after i updated to the last version of the formware is not recognising anymore the router
reviews.author: Mitu Emil

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Super easy setup
reviews.author: Viet Hoang

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Crashes on Galaxy s4

reviews.comment: Installed fine, but when I go to run it, it goes to a black screen & then force closes.

reviews.comment: Xperia Z.

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: I\'m connected to my dir-825 but the app constantly tells me I\'m not connected. No updates to the app since last year which tells me this app is dead and should be pulled from the store.

reviews.title: Crashes on launch
reviews.comment: S4 - crashes when  launched

reviews.title: DIR-505; Does not work.
reviews.comment: App seems to be working, but after applying my settings the app claims that the device is rebooting (it\'s not) and settings are  not changed.
reviews.author: Gisle Martin von Hafenbradl

reviews.comment: Unfortunately....
